name: Happy Birb (Amy Lillya)
description:
This is my very first game, yes it's a Flappy Bird clone.

I made it by following the GMT beginners tutorial.

How to play:

Press spacebar or click on the screen to go up.

Changelog:

v0.1

  • First release of the game

v0.2

  • New sprites for the wooden logs
  • Added vertical movement to the log obstacles
  • Changed UI typo

v0.3

  • Added main menu
  • Added high score display
  • Fixed UI alignments
  • Pressing spacebar on game over restarts the game

v0.4

  • Added new birb sprite with animations
  • Logs now stop on game over
  • New menu screen
